A sermon preached before the Queen at White-Hall, January the 30th being the day of the martyrdom of King Charles the First by the Bishop of St. Asaph, Lord Almoner to Their Majesties. Lloyd, William, 1627-1717.
[4], 32 p.
Printed for Thomas Jones ..., London : 1691.
Half title: The Bishop of St. Asaph's sermon preach'd before the Queen at White-Hall. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======
